name: perl6-announce
comments: See http://dev.perl.org/lists for more Perl6 mailing lists on a wide variety of topics
unsub: Send an empty email to mailto: perl6-announce-unsubscribe@perl.org
summary: A read-only list for Perl6 announcements.
sub: Send an empty email to mailto: perl6-announce-subscribe@perl.org
help: send an empty email to mailto: perl6-announce-help@perl.org
